state_description: This screen allows the user to securely delete selected files or folders using the Shredder feature of CleanMyMac X. The user can select items to shred and initiate the shredding process.

enables.name: Shred
enables.description: Permanently delete the selected file or folder (Telegram Desktop) securely.

enables.name: Start Over
enables.description: Return to the initial state of the Shredder tool to select different files or folders.
